name: cube-ui
description: Design System, UI Kit and an Admin dashboard built with React and Tailwind CSS. Based on Untitled UI

scripts.types: yarn workspace @cube-ui/components types && yarn workspace @cube-ui/foundation types
scripts.build: yarn workspace @cube-ui/foundation build && yarn workspace @cube-ui/components build
scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules && yarn workspaces run clean
